Articles.Content:
I got a problem with quicksave. I can not save - F5 doesn't work. Restart doesn't help. It looks like one of the quicksave is broken because on the other one there is no problem. Does anybody got any solution for this problem ?

Edited October 3, 2015 by Stigy

Sounds like a support question, and so, the thread has been moved.

What do you mean by "one of" the quicksaves? Can you describe the problem more fully?

Sorry for posting in the wrong place.

I got my quicksaves copied in "save" folder. So i can go back to older saves. When last quicksave is loaded i can not quicksave again. If i use older versions e.g. from 2 hours ago F5 does work.

Edited October 3, 2015 by Stigy

If quicksaving isn't working after loading a specific quicksave, sounds like there is an issue going on with that save.

If you can, please start KSP and cause the problem again, then upload the log file. You can find instructions on where the log file is in the help sticky in this forum. Also, might be helpful to upload the quicksave.

Cheers,

-Claw

Ok. Where should I upload this file ?

P.S. I got moded install.

Edited October 3, 2015 by Stigy

Hello Stigy.

Please upload the save file to dropbox with the output_log.txt, file that is in the KSP_Data folder, thank you.
